```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
#explore the diamonds dataset
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
#create a pairs plot

ggpairs(data = diamonds)
```

#Diamonds Scatter Plot
```{r}
   ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) + geom_point()
```


#histogram 
```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) + geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = clarity, y = price)) + geom_jitter()
       
```
